> <OLD>
>
> "I need a scientist mind in this little expedition" said dryly the male "To
> the shuttle"

<NEW>

Tarantulus smiled inegmatically as he rubbed his hands together
eagerlly. "Of course of course" he said, his optics darting around as
they moved. "I would be happy to help you in any way that I can."
Tarantulus' voice was as always wily and crafty, his intelligent mind
always spinning webs within itself.

> The predacon commander come inside a shuttle and waitted to the others
> "Whene verybody is inside.. Set the shuttle in the last know coordinates "

There were many soldier already at the shuttle when Hydras arrived,
Insecticon and Bruticus-X, both of whom had just finished being
repaired. The remaineder of the fuzors, Injector, Buzzclaw,
Terrorgator, and Quickstrike. Lastly came the soldiers that had served
with the old Megatron - Terrorsaur, Waspinator, and Inferno.

Only Cyclonus, Scourge, Deepstryke, Blackrazor and Phobia stayed
behind, presumably to care for Hydras' base, to be sure that it would
be protected. Hydras' The shuttle quickly started up, and with a boost
of power quickly took off in the direction of Skyshadow's last
transmission.

After nearly 30 minutes of flight the ship was begining to come to the
approximate location of Skyshadow's last known location, but so far
all that could be scanned was a fading vapor trail. The sensors were
picking up that the ship had flown through here at one point, but now
was no longer visible.

A voice came over the communication band to Hydras' shuttle, "This is
the VMP Security Force, you are invading our airspace. You will state
your businiess or prepare to be engaged."

(TAG)

Preston
